my-service-name.dest_type: put here your destination: hubic, gdrive or sftp
my-service-name.dest_path: destination path of hubic, gdrive or sftp
my-service-name.exclude_dir: do you exclude a directory from backup?
my-service-name.retention_days: day of retention in M(months), D(days) or Y(year)
my-service-name.retention_full: how many full backup to save
my-service-name.only_sftp_string: user@host:port if you use sftp, otherwise empty
